metadata.name: z Mod items EID Korean translations
metadata.description:
This mod adds Korean EID translations for following modded items: [list] [*]Fiend Folio (Also adds : Golem machines) [*]Retribution [*]Revelations [*]Samael [/list] Released as seperate mod to make translation update faster.
Please enjoy original mod. EID : https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=836319872 Fiend Folio : https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2851063440 Retribution : https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2881008017 Revelations : https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2880387531
Special thanks to Curezor for adding Fiend Folio icons for EID!
